image_summary: A damaged or destroyed dark-colored rectangular structure, possibly a building or large container, shown from multiple angles. The object appears to have sustained significant damage with irregular edges, debris, and what looks like battle or destruction damage. The structure has multiple horizontal layers or floors visible, with a small opening or window visible on one face. The object is rendered in dark tones (black/dark gray) against a light background.
